title: Access groups
description: An Access group is a set of reusable rules that can be quickly applied across many Access policies.

name.description: The name of the Access group.

include.description: Rules evaluated with an OR logical operator. A user needs to meet only one of the Include rules.

items.description: Rules in an Access policy. The rule object contains selectors at the top level, and nested inside are the values each selector will match on.

email.description: The email of the user.

everyone.description: An empty object which matches on all users.

ip.description: An IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR block.

oneOf.title: IP list
oneOf.description: Matches an IP address from a list.

id.description: The ID of a previously created IP list.
The ID of a previously created Access group.
The ID of an Azure group.

connection_id.description: The ID of your Azure identity provider.
The ID of your Github identity provider.

oneOf.title: Google Workspace group
oneOf.description: Matches a group in Google Workspace.
oneOf.cfExtendedDescription: Requires a Google Workspace identity provider.

email.description: The email of the Google Workspace group.

connection_id.description: The ID of your Google Workspace identity provider.

email.description: The email of the Okta group.

connection_id.description: The ID of your Okta identity provider.

attribute_name.description: The name of the SAML attribute.

attribute_value.description: The SAML attribute value to look for.

email.description: The email of the user.

everyone.description: An empty object which matches on all users.

ip.description: An IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR block.

id.description: The ID of a previously created Access group.
The ID of an Azure group.

connection_id.description: The ID of your Azure identity provider.
The ID of your Github identity provider.

object_definition.title: Access groups
object_definition.description: An Access group is a set of reusable rules that can be quickly applied across many Access policies.
